main.name: Sebastian
main.description: Hi, my name is Sebastian and I am a second-year student at University of Virginia double-majoring in Computer Science and Economics.
main.bio: I am from Peru and love playing soccer. Since young, I had an interest in Maths and the natural sciences. During high school, I discovered my interest in Economics and when arriving at UVA I realized I had a passion for Computer Science too. I am currently evaluating career paths related to both majors and I am looking to get a wide range of new experiences. This summer I will be a Software Development intern at an Investment/Portfolio Management firm.
main.contactmessage: Please don't hesitate to contact me at spc2jxe@virginia.edu
